 SELECT LocationID,Location FROM st_locationmaster lm   INNER JOIN f_panel_master pm on pm.`panel_id`=lm.`panel_id`   inner join centre_master cm on cm.`CentreID`=CASE WHEN pm.`PanelType` ='Centre' then pm.`CentreID` else pm.tagprocessinglabid END AND pm.`PanelType` in('Centre','PUP') and cm.isactive=1  AND cm.BusinessZoneID IN(5,1,4,3,2)  AND cm.StateID IN(2,4,5,6,10,9,7,30,23,8,11,29,12,13,14,15,16,24,19,18,3,25,22,28,21,1,26,31,17) AND cm.cityid IN(348,1,315,309,114,253,143,121,280,129,10,187,59,72,260,310,71,341,219,116,174,216,217,74,265,344,175,270,47,87,335,328,48,221,223,73,136,124,358,146,66,261,224,89,220,164,91,193,271,41,186,272,76,37,109,162,342,243,319,196,287,233,237,234,12,304,11,141,138,240,142,88,50,39,222,208,347,103,192,225,27,44,26,127,191,212,94,313,55,105,20,215,254,147,330,153,354,364,329,331,226,115,327,200,104,70,314,194,43,209,31,68,367,368,229,203,18,148,337,259,360,284,36,165,235,230,195,275,151,283,357,299,9,257,281,361,323,177,125,210,80,92,99,77,159,274,156,33,123,5,128,85,157,45,163,363,86,249,295,30,181,3,282,35,269,154,250,178,60,96,49,19,338,130,297,207,170,61,236,198,42,238,264,305,227,93,100,255,247,16,190,168,176,352,13,267,158,169,25,81,199,266,182,205,370,322,332,62,51,288,4,102,252,150,117,248,167,239,300,334,28,317,6,362,326,321,351,278,320,285,75,311,52,242,29,316,303,350,82,46,7,307,90,137,286,134,83,343,279,17,110,8,268,38,108,106,107,213,251,201,139,145,155,356,119,256,324,339,78,22,180,126,14,298,189,277,58,232,98,101,183,122,95,218,197,345,336,202,184,149,160,84,353,273,120,63,211,292,293,53,263,64,214,312,79,67,171,244,188,32,262,204,346,172,152,333,54,291,65,173,161,40,111,112,325,369,24,185,56,131,118,97,355,133,132,294,258,296,34,289,318,290,276,245,302,179,241,166,231,135,57,140,359,301,308,21,306,23,2,246,69,113,15,206,228,144,340)  AND cm.Type1Id IN(11,9,12,13,6,7,5,4,3) WHERE lm.IsActive=1 ORDER BY lm.Location
